001import javax.swing.*;
002import java.awt.*;
003import java.awt.event.*;
004import java.net.URL;
005import java.awt.image.*;
006
007/**
008 * This class implements a simple graphical user interface with a 
009 * text entry area, a text output area and an optional image.
010 * 
011 * @author Michael Kolling
012 * @version 1.0 (Jan 2003) DB edited (2023)
013 */
014public class UserInterface implements ActionListener
015{
016    private GameEngine aEngine;
017    private JFrame     aMyFrame;
018    private JTextField aEntryField;
019    private JTextArea  aLog;
020    private JLabel     aImage;
021    private JLabel     aImageMap;
022
023    //Btn Command
024    private JButton    aBtnAudio;
025    private JButton    aBtnQuit;
026    private JButton    aBtnHelp;
027    private JButton    aBtnEat;
028    private JButton    aBtnLook;
029    private JButton    aBtnBack;
030    //Btn Basic Direction
031    private JButton    aBtnNorth;
032    private JButton    aBtnSouth;
033    private JButton    aBtnEast;
034    private JButton    aBtnWest;
035    //Btn Other Direction
036    private JButton    aBtnUp;
037    private JButton    aBtnDown;
038    private JButton    aBtnDownWest;
039    private JButton    aBtnDownEast;
040    private JButton    aBtnUpNorth;
041    private JButton    aBtnUpEast;
042    private JButton    aBtnUpWest;
043    private JButton    aBtnDownSouth;
044    
045    private JButton    aBtnAttackLegere;
046    private JButton    aBtnAttackLourde;
047
048    private boolean    aBool;
049
050    /**
051     * Construct a UserInterface. As a parameter, a Game Engine
052     * (an object processing and executing the game commands) is needed
053     * @param pGameEngine  The GameEngine object implementing the game logic
054     */
055    public UserInterface(final GameEngine pGameEngine ) {
056        this.aEngine = pGameEngine;
057        this.createGUI();
058        this.aBool = true;
059        showMinimapImage("./Images/Map.png");
060    } // UserInterface(.)
061
062    /**
063     * Print out some text into the text area
064     */
065    public void print(final String pText ) {
066        this.aLog.append( pText );
067        this.aLog.setCaretPosition( this.aLog.getDocument().getLength() );
068    } // print(.)
069
070    /**
071     * Print out some text into the text area, followed by a line break
072     */
073    public void println(final String pText ) {
074        this.print( pText + "\n" );
075    } // println(.)
076
077    /**
078     * Show an image file in the interface.
079     */
080    public void showImage(final String pImageName ) {
081        String vImagePath = "" + pImageName; // to change the directory
082        URL vImageURL = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource( vImagePath );
083        if ( vImageURL == null )
084            System.out.println( "Image not found : " + vImagePath );
085        else {
086            ImageIcon vIcon = new ImageIcon( vImageURL );
087            this.aImage.setIcon( vIcon );
088            this.aMyFrame.pack();
089        }
090    } // showImage(.)
091
092    public void showMinimapImage(String imagePath) {
093        URL imageURL = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource(imagePath);
094        if (imageURL == null) {
095            System.out.println("Image not found: " + imagePath);
096        } else {
097            ImageIcon icon = new ImageIcon(imageURL);
098            this.aImageMap.setIcon(icon);
099        }
100    }
101
102    /**
103     * Enable or disable input in the entry field
104     */
105    public void enable(final boolean pOnOff ) {
106        this.aEntryField.setEditable( pOnOff ); // enable/disable
107        if ( pOnOff ) { // enable
108            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 500 ); // cursor blink
109            this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this ); // reacts to entry
110        }
111        else { // disable
112            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 0 ); // cursor won't blink
113            this.aEntryField.removeActionListener( this ); // won't react to entry
114        }
115    } // enable(.)
116
117    /**
118     * Set up graphical user interface
119     */
120    private void createGUI() {
121        this.aMyFrame = new JFrame( "Crash ship" ); // change the title !
122        this.aEntryField = new JTextField( 34 );
123        
124        this.aMyFrame.setExtendedState(JFrame.MAXIMIZED_BOTH);
125        
126        this.aLog = new JTextArea();
127        this.aLog.setEditable( false );
128        JScrollPane vListScroller = new JScrollPane( this.aLog );
129        vListScroller.setPreferredSize( new Dimension(450, 450) );
130        vListScroller.setMinimumSize( new Dimension(200,200) );
131
132        //JButton
133        this.aBtnAudio = new JButton("play audio");
134        this.aBtnAudio.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,40));
135
136        this.aBtnQuit = new JButton("quit");
137        this.aBtnQuit.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,40));
138
139        this.aBtnHelp = new JButton("help");
140        this.aBtnHelp.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,40));
141
142        this.aBtnEat = new JButton("eat");
143        this.aBtnEat.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,40));
144
145        this.aBtnLook = new JButton("look");
146        this.aBtnLook.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,40));
147
148        this.aBtnBack = new JButton("back");
149        this.aBtnBack.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,40));
150
151        this.aBtnNorth = new JButton("North");
152        this.aBtnNorth.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,40));
153
154        this.aBtnSouth = new JButton("South");
155        this.aBtnSouth.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,40));
156
157        this.aBtnEast = new JButton("East");
158        this.aBtnEast.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,40));
159
160        this.aBtnWest = new JButton("West");
161        this.aBtnWest.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,40));
162
163        this.aBtnUp = new JButton("Up");
164        this.aBtnUp.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,40));
165
166        this.aBtnDown = new JButton("Down");
167        this.aBtnDown.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,40));
168
169        this.aBtnDownWest = new JButton("DownWest");
170        this.aBtnDownWest.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,40));
171
172        this.aBtnDownEast = new JButton("DownEast");
173        this.aBtnDownEast.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,40));
174
175        this.aBtnUpNorth = new JButton("UpNorth");
176        this.aBtnUpNorth.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,40));
177
178        this.aBtnUpEast = new JButton("UpEast");
179        this.aBtnUpEast.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,40));
180
181        this.aBtnUpWest = new JButton("UpWest");
182        this.aBtnUpWest.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,40));
183
184        this.aBtnDownSouth = new JButton("DownSouth");
185        this.aBtnDownSouth.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,40));
186        
187        this.aBtnAttackLegere = new JButton("ArmeLegere");
188        this.aBtnAttackLegere.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(120,40));     
189        
190        this.aBtnAttackLourde = new JButton("ArmeLourde");
191        this.aBtnAttackLourde.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(120,40));      
192
193        //JLabel
194        this.aImage = new JLabel();
195
196        // CrÃ©ez un nouveau JLabel pour la minimap
197        this.aImageMap = new JLabel();
198        this.aImageMap.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(469, 350));
199
200        //temporraire je change la size de l'emplacement de l'image 
201        //this.aImage.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(200, 200));
202
203        JPanel vPaneCommand = new JPanel();   
204        vPaneCommand.setLayout(new GridLayout(2, 7) );
205        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnAudio, BorderLayout.CENTER );
206        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnQuit,BorderLayout.CENTER );
207        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnHelp,BorderLayout.CENTER );
208        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnEat,BorderLayout.CENTER );
209        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnLook,BorderLayout.CENTER );
210        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnBack,BorderLayout.CENTER );
211        
212        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnNorth, BorderLayout.NORTH );
213        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnSouth,BorderLayout.SOUTH );
214        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnEast,BorderLayout.EAST );
215        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnWest,BorderLayout.WEST );
216
217        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnUp,BorderLayout.NORTH );
218        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnDown,BorderLayout.SOUTH );
219        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnDownWest,BorderLayout.WEST );
220        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnDownEast,BorderLayout.EAST );
221        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnUpNorth,BorderLayout.NORTH );
222        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnUpEast,BorderLayout.EAST );
223        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnUpWest,BorderLayout.WEST );
224        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnDownSouth,BorderLayout.SOUTH );
225        
226        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnAttackLegere,BorderLayout.WEST );
227        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnAttackLourde,BorderLayout.SOUTH );
228        
229        /*
230        JPanel vMainPanel = new JPanel();      
231        vMainPanel.setLayout( new BorderLayout()); // ==> only five places
232        vMainPanel.add( this.aImage, BorderLayout.NORTH );
233        vMainPanel.add( vListScroller, BorderLayout.CENTER );
234        vMainPanel.add( this.aEntryField, BorderLayout.SOUTH );
235        vMainPanel.add( vPaneCommand, BorderLayout.EAST);//le placer Ã  l'est
236        //vMainPanel.add( vPaneDirection, BorderLayout.WEST);//le placer Ã  l'est
237        vMainPanel.add(this.aImageMap, BorderLayout.WEST); // LINE_END est l'Ã©quivalent de EAST
238         */
239
240        JPanel vMainPanel = new JPanel();
241        vMainPanel.setLayout(new GridBagLayout());
242        GridBagConstraints gbc = new GridBagConstraints();
243
244        // this.aImage en haut Ã  gauche
245        gbc.gridx = 0;
246        gbc.gridy = 0;
247        gbc.anchor = GridBagConstraints.NORTHWEST;
248        vMainPanel.add(this.aImage, gbc);
249
250        // vListScroller au milieu
251        gbc.gridx = 0;
252        gbc.gridy = 1;
253        gbc.gridwidth = 3;
254        gbc.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
255        vMainPanel.add(vListScroller, gbc);
256
257        // vMinimapContainer en haut Ã  droite
258        JPanel vMinimapContainer = new JPanel();
259        vMinimapContainer.add(this.aImageMap, BorderLayout.CENTER);
260        vMinimapContainer.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(200, 200));  
261        Insets marginMinimap = new Insets(10, 0, 0, 0); 
262        gbc.gridx = 2;
263        gbc.gridy = 0;
264        gbc.gridwidth = 1;
265        gbc.anchor = GridBagConstraints.NORTHEAST;
266        gbc.insets = marginMinimap; 
267        vMainPanel.add(vMinimapContainer, gbc);
268
269        // vPaneCommand en bas Ã  droite
270        gbc.gridx = 2;
271        gbc.gridy = 2;
272        gbc.gridwidth = 1;
273        gbc.fill = GridBagConstraints.VERTICAL;
274        gbc.anchor = GridBagConstraints.SOUTHEAST;
275        Insets marginPaneCommand = new Insets(0, 0, 10, 0); 
276        gbc.insets = marginPaneCommand;
277        vMainPanel.add(vPaneCommand, gbc);
278
279        // this.aEntryField en bas de la page
280        gbc.gridx = 0;
281        gbc.gridy = 3;
282        gbc.gridwidth = 3;
283        gbc.fill = GridBagConstraints.HORIZONTAL;
284        Insets marginEntryField = new Insets(0, 0, 10, 0); 
285        gbc.insets = marginEntryField;
286        vMainPanel.add(this.aEntryField, gbc);
287
288        // Ajoutez le panneau principal au contenu du cadre
289        this.aMyFrame.getContentPane().add(vMainPanel);
290
291        // Ajoutez le label de la minimap au panneau principal
292        //this.aMyFrame.getContentPane().add( vMainPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER );
293
294        // add some event listeners to some components
295        this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this );
296
297        this.aBtnAudio.addActionListener( this );
298        this.aBtnQuit.addActionListener( this );
299        this.aBtnHelp.addActionListener( this );
300        this.aBtnEat.addActionListener( this );
301        this.aBtnLook.addActionListener( this );
302        this.aBtnBack.addActionListener(this );
303
304        this.aBtnNorth.addActionListener( this );
305        this.aBtnSouth.addActionListener( this );
306        this.aBtnEast.addActionListener( this );
307        this.aBtnWest.addActionListener( this );
308
309        this.aBtnUp.addActionListener( this );
310        this.aBtnDown.addActionListener( this );
311        this.aBtnDownWest.addActionListener( this );
312        this.aBtnDownEast.addActionListener( this );
313        this.aBtnUpNorth.addActionListener( this );
314        this.aBtnUpEast.addActionListener( this );
315        this.aBtnUpWest.addActionListener( this );
316        this.aBtnDownSouth.addActionListener( this );
317        this.aBtnAttackLegere.addActionListener( this );
318        this.aBtnAttackLourde.addActionListener( this );
319
320        // to end program when window is closed
321        this.aMyFrame.addWindowListener(
322            new WindowAdapter() { // anonymous class
323                @Override public void windowClosing(final WindowEvent pE)
324                {
325                    System.exit(0);
326                }
327            } );
328
329        this.aMyFrame.pack();
330        this.aMyFrame.setVisible( true );
331        this.aEntryField.requestFocus();
332    } // createGUI()
333
334    /**
335     * Actionlistener interface for entry textfield
336     */
337    @Override public void actionPerformed( final ActionEvent pE ) {
338        if (pE.getSource() == this.aBtnAudio) {
339            this.aBool =! this.aBool;
340            if(aBool == false) {
341                this.aBtnAudio.setText("stop audio");
342                this.aEngine.toggleAudio();
343            }else {
344                this.aBtnAudio.setText("play audio");
345                this.aEngine.toggleAudio();
346            }
347        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnQuit ){
348            this.aEngine.interpretCommand(this.aBtnQuit.getActionCommand());   
349
350        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnHelp ){
351            this.aEngine.interpretCommand(this.aBtnHelp.getActionCommand()); 
352
353        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnEat ){
354            this.aEngine.interpretCommand(this.aBtnEat.getActionCommand());
355
356        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnLook ){
357            this.aEngine.interpretCommand(this.aBtnLook.getActionCommand());
358
359        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnBack ){
360            this.aEngine.interpretCommand(this.aBtnBack.getActionCommand());
361
362        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnNorth ){
363            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go north");
364
365        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnSouth ){
366            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go south");
367
368        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnEast ){
369            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go east");
370
371        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnWest ){
372            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go west");
373
374        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnUp ){
375            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go up");
376
377        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnDown ){
378            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go down");
379
380        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnDownWest ){
381            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go downwest");
382
383        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnDownEast ){
384            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go downeast");
385
386        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnUpNorth ){
387            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go upnorth");
388
389        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnUpEast ){
390            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go upeast");
391
392        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnUpWest ){
393            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go upwest");
394
395        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnDownSouth ){
396            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go downsouth");
397            
398        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnAttackLegere ){
399            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("attack ArmeLegere");
400            
401        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnAttackLourde ){
402            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("attack ArmeLourde");
403
404        }else 
405            this.processCommand(); // never suppress this line
406    } // actionPerformed(.)
407
408    /**
409     * A command has been entered in the entry field
410     * Read the command and do whatever is necessary to process it
411     */
412    private void processCommand(){
413        String vInput = this.aEntryField.getText();
414        this.aEntryField.setText( "\n" );
415
416        this.aEngine.interpretCommand( vInput );
417    } // processCommand()
418
419    /**
420     * Ferme la fenÃªtre de l'interface graphique, si elle est ouverte
421     */
422    public void closeFrame() {
423        if (this.aMyFrame != null) {
424            this.aMyFrame.dispose();
425        }
426    } //closeFrame()
427
428} // UserInterface
